credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
title: Design for a Chatelaine with Watch
medium: Brush and gouache, gum varnish, graphite on buff-colored laid paper
description: Design for a diamond-encrusted golden watch hanging from a heavy golden brooch (chatelaine). Ornamented in neo-Renaissance style with pearls and rubies, this stunning jewel features a golden hour-glass and a figure of Father Time holding a scythe. Winged female sea creatures support the brooch and watch case.
name: Drawing
